Object.Field:
Author: Sunopsis Version: 4.0 Last Update : DEC-2004
Description : - Reverse Knowledge Module - Reverse engineering Knowledge Module to retrieve the tables and views structures in Informix (columns, primary keys, non unique index). This knowledge module works for Informix SE, IDS databases
To use this knowledge module and run the reverse engineering: 1. Import this knowledge module in one of your projects. 2. Create an Informix technology model and choose the reverse context as well as the knowledge module in the "reverse" tab. 3. Execute the reverse engineering and follow up the steps in the logs.
Restrictions: - The mask of tables to reverse must not be empty, and at least contain the '%' character. - The tab Selective reverse cannot be used with this knowledge module.
insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, 'I', '1', '1', '1' )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(idx.idxname) KEY_NAME from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab where idx.idxtype ='D' and idx.tabid = tab.tabid and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(idx.idxname) KEY_NAME, trim(col.colname) COL_NAME, col.colno POS from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab, informix.syscolumns col where idx.tabid = tab.tabid and idx.idxtype in ('D') and ((col.colno=idx.part1 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part2 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part3 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part4 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part5 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part6 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part7 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part8 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) ) and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, 'T', '1', :R_COUNT )

select trim(t.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(t.tabname) RES_NAME, t.tabname[1,3] TABLE_ALIAS, t.nrows R_COUNT from informix.systables t where t.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and t.tabtype in ( 'T','V','E')

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, POS, LONGC, BYTES, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :POS, :LONGC, :BYTES, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '1', '1' )

select trim(t.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(c.colname) COL_NAME, trim(case when coltype >= 256 then case when coltype - 256=0 then 'CHAR' when coltype - 256=1 then 'SMALLINT' when coltype - 256=2 then 'INTEGER' when coltype - 256=3 then 'FLOAT' when coltype - 256=4 then 'SMALLFLOAT' when coltype - 256=5 then 'DECIMAL' when coltype - 256=6 then 'SERIAL' when coltype - 256=7 then 'DATE' when coltype - 256=8 then 'MONEY' when coltype - 256=10 then 'DATE' when coltype - 256=11 then 'BYTE' when coltype - 256=12 then 'TEXT' when coltype - 256=13 then 'VARCHAR' when coltype - 256=14 then 'INTERVAL' when coltype - 256=15 then 'NCHAR' when coltype - 256=16 then 'NVCHAR' end when coltype < 256 then case when coltype =0 then 'CHAR' when coltype =1 then 'SMALLINT' when coltype =2 then 'INTEGER' when coltype =3 then 'FLOAT' when coltype =4 then 'SMALLFLOAT' when coltype =5 then 'DECIMAL' when coltype =6 then 'SERIAL' when coltype =7 then 'DATE' when coltype =8 then 'MONEY' when coltype =10 then 'DATE' when coltype =11 then 'BYTE' when coltype =12 then 'TEXT' when coltype =13 then 'VARCHAR' when coltype =14 then 'INTERVAL' when coltype =15 then 'NCHAR' when coltype =16 then 'NVCHAR' end end) DT_DRIVER, c.colno POS, case when coltype >=256 then case when coltype-256 = 0 then c.collength when coltype-256 = 1 then 5 when (coltype-256 = 2 or coltype-256 = 6) then 10 when coltype-256 = 3 then 64 when coltype-256 = 4 then 32 when (coltype-256 = 5 or coltype = 8) then (trunc(c.collength / 256)) when (coltype-256 = 13 or coltype-256 = 16) then (c.collength - (trunc(c.collength / 256))*256) end when coltype <256 then case when coltype = 0 then c.collength when coltype = 1 then 5 when (coltype = 2 or coltype = 6) then 10 when coltype = 3 then 64 when coltype = 4 then 32 when (coltype = 5 or coltype = 8) then (trunc(c.collength / 256)) when (coltype = 13 or coltype = 16) then (c.collength - (trunc(c.collength / 256))*256) end end LONGC, case when coltype >=256 then case when coltype-256 = 0 then c.collength when coltype-256 = 1 then 5 when (coltype-256 = 2 or coltype-256 = 6) then 10 when coltype-256 = 3 then 64 when coltype-256 = 4 then 32 when (coltype-256 = 5 or coltype = 8) then (trunc(c.collength / 256)) when (coltype-256 = 13 or coltype-256 = 16) then (c.collength - (trunc(c.collength / 256))*256) end when coltype <256 then case when coltype = 0 then c.collength when coltype = 1 then 5 when (coltype = 2 or coltype = 6) then 10 when coltype = 3 then 64 when coltype = 4 then 32 when (coltype = 5 or coltype = 8) then (trunc(c.collength / 256)) when (coltype = 13 or coltype = 16) then (c.collength - (trunc(c.collength / 256))*256) end end BYTES, case when coltype >=256 then case when (coltype-256 = 1 or coltype-256 = 2 or coltype-256 = 6) then 0 when (coltype-256 = 5 or coltype-256 = 8) then (c.collength - ((trunc(c.collength / 256))*256)) end when coltype <256 then case when (coltype = 1 or coltype = 2 or coltype = 6) then 0 when (coltype = 5 or coltype = 8) then (c.collength - ((trunc(c.collength / 256))*256)) end end SCALEC, case when coltype >= 256 then '1' ELSE '0' end COL_MANDATORY from informix.syscolumns c,informix.systables t Where t.owner like '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and t.tabid=c.tabid
insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, 'PK', '1', '1', '1' )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(idx.idxname) KEY_NAME from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab where idx.idxtype = 'U' and idx.tabid = tab.tabid and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) values ( <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(idx.idxname) KEY_NAME, trim(col.colname) COL_NAME, col.colno POS from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab, informix.syscolumns col where idx.tabid =tab.tabid and idx.idxtype in ('U') and ((col.colno=idx.part1 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part2 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part3 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part4 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part5 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part6 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part7 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) or (col.colno=idx.part8 and col.tabid=idx.tabid) ) and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
